      • switchScreen

        public void switchScreen(int i)
        Switches the current active Screen to the one at the given index. Ex: myDrawingSurface.switchScreen(ScreenSwitcher.MENU_SCREEN) should switch to the Menu Screen
        Specified by:
        switchScreen in interface ScreenSwitcher
        Parameters:
        i - Index of the Screen that this DrawingSurface should end displaying.
